0/1D6 Sanity points

What are the names of some deep one communities mentioned in the text?
Ahu-Y’hloa, Y’ha-nth-lei, and G’ll-oo
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the typical appearance of a Deep One Hybrid?
A Deep One Hybrid typically has bulging, watery blue eyes, a flat nose, a receding forehead and chin, and singularly underdeveloped ears.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What physical changes occur in Deep One Hybrids in late teens?
In late teens, Deep One Hybrids commonly exhibit the 'Innsmouth Look', which includes changes in appearance and physiology.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the ultimate fate of a Deep One Hybrid?
By middle age, most Deep One Hybrids display some form of gross deformity, and they typically undergo a final transformation into a Deep One and embark on a new life in the sea.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do Deep One Hybrids typically live their lives?
Deep One Hybrids typically retire to the privacy of their close-shuttered homes, often due to the societal stigma of their deformities.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are deep one hybrids?
The progeny of deep one and human mating
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the 'Innsmouth Look'?
Changes in appearance and physiology that occur in late teens
You are a helpful AI assistant.
At what stage do deep one hybrids undergo the final transformation?
By middle age
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What physical changes do deep one hybrids experience?
Gross deformity and an awakening of new senses
